referrals.info: The minimum withdrawal amount is 10 TON

leaderboard.text: Compete, climb the ranks, and earn rewards!

donate.demo_desk: Your current balance and inventory will be temporarily unavailable.
donate.demo_desk_left: Your original balance and inventory will be available again.
donate.max_ton_value: Do not exceed 200 TON at a time.
donate.deposit_stars_desk: At deposit by stars withdrawal of gifts is frozen for 3 days from the date of the last deposit. Further withdrawal will be available as usual.

blockedBalance.title: Blocked Balance
blockedBalance.text:
The held portion of your referral earnings from player deposits in Stars. 

Each portion of the balance is unlocked 21 days after the deposit date.

tonGift.text1: TON’s on your balance. Maybe this is just the warm-up?
tonGift.text2: TON’s on your balance. Maybe this is just the warm-up?
tonGift.text3: TON landed, but the thrill isn’t slowing down. Ready to see what’s next?
tonGift.text4: TON dropped in — looks like the crystal just gave you a reason to open it again.
tonGift.text5: Jackpot is for next time — for now, here’s TON to keep things interesting. Keep going!
